author: FARA Development Team
description: Advanced FAQ system with hybrid commands, live Helpshift scraping, fuzzy search, synonym support, and version history. Designed for Fire & Rescue Academy (MissionChief USA).
install_msg: Thank you for installing FAQManager! Use `/faq settings` to configure your FAQ system. Start by setting up editor roles with `/faq roles add @Role`. For help, use `/faq help`.
short: FAQ system with Helpshift integration and smart search
name: FAQManager
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores FAQ content, user IDs for authorship tracking, and server configuration. No personal message content is stored. Outdated reports include user IDs for moderation purposes.
